r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
* bugs - bug #13137 : Standard test suite failed under *nix
* news - req #12857 : Add the option to locally mask exceptions see new api 1.7.0 options: ignore_functions_match, ignore_extensions_match, ignore_constants_match. - req #13138 : separate constants and tokens in results - req #13147 : CLI: add filter file extension option on parsing directory
